    • Method Detail

      • getPolicyPeriod

        PolicyPeriod getPolicyPeriod()
        Used by PlcyBillingInstructionCreated to add invoices to invoice items for the policy period relevant to the given billing instruction
        Returns:
        the policy period relevant to the given billing instruction

      • changesExistingPolicyPeriod

        @Deprecated
boolean changesExistingPolicyPeriod()
        Deprecated. (Since 8.0.0) This method is never used. All ExistingPlcyPeriodBI subtypes return true, all NewPlcyPeriodBIs subtypes return false.
        This method is used to determine whether invoicing should follow the rules for a new policy period or those for changes to an existing policy period. We should NOT use XXX instanceof PolicyChange, since oftentimes we want the same behavior out of Audit, Cancellation, or Reinstatement. The same goes for Issuance - Renewal and NewRenewal will most of the time have the same behavior.

      • createSegregatedCollateralRequirementForDepositRequirement

        CollateralRequirement createSegregatedCollateralRequirementForDepositRequirement()
        Returns:
        the collateral requirement created for this BI

      • addPaymentPlanModifiers

        void addPaymentPlanModifiers(PaymentPlanModifier... paymentPlanModifiers)
        Adds paymentPlanModifiers to this instruction's list of paymentPlanModifiers.
        Parameters:
        paymentPlanModifiers - the modifiers to be added
